questions.question: According to the United States Constitution, the federal census is used to determine the

choices.answer: size of the United States Supreme Court

choices.answer: ratification of the Constitution of the UnitedStates

choices.answer: desire of corporations to reduce their taxes

choices.answer: escape urban unrest in coastal cities

choices.answer: expansion of political machines

choices.answer: The president appoints all federal judges.
